document_data.name: Barglun Blackbutter
document_data.mainbody: '''Barglun Blackbutter''' was the founder of the [[Blackbutter Inn]] in [[Red Larch]].
document_data.Personality: Barglun was a fat and jovial individual who was fondly remembered as a local legend in the village.
document_data.History: Around [[1358 DR]], Barglum was slain by a pack of [[wolves]].
